author: Lizzy Buchan, Lizzy Buchan
title: Coronavirus: Let patients disclose ethnicity in symptom tracker to monitor 'disproportionate' impact on Bame groups, say MPs
description: Exclusive: 'Data will be vital in informing our response to and management of this virus'
content:
Ministers have been urged to let people list their ethnicity on the NHS coronavirus symptom tracker amid concerns about the disproportionate impact of Covid-19 on black, Asian and minority ethnic (Bame) communities.
NHS bosses are leading a formal review int… [+5904 chars]
